name: DDNSNotify
short_description: DDNSNotify logs into a (telnet-enabled) router and retrieves the WAN IP Address, only IF the IP Address differs from the DNS IP address for the domain name. It's useful to update DNS records using another external DDNS script (such as zoneclient.py).
